meanings.definition: The quality or state of being religious.
meanings.sent1: Her deep religiousnesses shone through in her daily prayers.
meanings.sent2: The community admired his strong religiousnesses and dedication to his faith.
meanings.sent3: Despite his love for science fiction, his religiousnesses was unwavering.
meanings.sent4: The religiousnesses of the ancient temple enveloped visitors in a sense of peace.
meanings.sent5: The religiousnesses of the choir performance moved the audience to tears.

meanings.definition: The practice of religious beliefs or observances.
meanings.sent1: The religiousnesses of the congregation was evident in their weekly gatherings.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the religiousnesses of attending church every Sunday.
meanings.sent3: His dedication to the religiousnesses of yoga surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The religiousnesses of the rituals brought a sense of unity to the community.
meanings.sent5: The religiousnesses of the holiday celebrations filled the town with joy.
